= 建站向导 =
<p>
	<span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">从FreeCMS 1.5开始支持</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">为了方便用户创建站点，系统提供了建站向导功能。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">从左侧管理菜单点击</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">建站向导</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">进入。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">第一步：创建站点</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081142_Kfmr_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081142_Kfmr_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">可以直接设置所属的父站点，填写相关属性后点击保存按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">第二步：选择模板</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081203_Ckag_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081203_Ckag_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择模板提供两种方式：</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">1.</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择现有模板，可直接选择现有的模板。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081223_AI4T_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081223_AI4T_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">2.</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">创建新模板，如果合适的现有模板，可以直接创建新的模板。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081239_lfAO_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081239_lfAO_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">第三步：站点初始化</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">如果是选择现有模板，并且模板带有初始化数据，系统则会提示是否对此站点进行初始化，推荐进行初始化操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081256_9b9o_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081256_9b9o_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">第四步：完成</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081313_Uc3J_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1011/081313_Uc3J_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
